articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: The glaring security risks with AI browser agents - TechCrunch
articles.description: New AI browsers from OpenAI and Perplexity promise to increase user productivity, but they also come with increased security risks.
articles.content: New AI-powered web browsers such as OpenAI’s ChatGPT Atlas and Perplexity’s Comet are trying to unseat Google Chrome as the front door to the internet for billions of users. A key selling point of th… [+6181 chars]

articles.title: A Single Point of Failure Triggered the Amazon Outage Affecting Million - Slashdot
articles.description: An anonymous reader quotes a report from Ars Technica: The outage that hit Amazon Web Services and took out vital services worldwide was the result of a single failure that cascaded from system to system within Amazon's sprawling network, according to a post-…
articles.content: I am sure there is some formal definition of a "race condition", but I don't think it requires a single multi-threaded machine. Perhaps it is "classic" in the sense of what is often used as an exampl… [+2009 chars]
